title: Saif, Wahab mark first win for Southern Punjab in National T20 Cup
text:
Saif Badar (49*) and Wahab Riaz (42*) partnered strongly to mark the first victory for Southern Punjab by four wickets against Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP) in National T20 Cup.

They both joined hands to score 49 runs on the seventh wicket to finish things on a strong note for Southern Punjab.

While batting first, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa scored 154-5 in 20 overs. After getting a slow start, KP’s sinking ship was sailed by Mohammad Rizwan and Khushdil Shah who partnered to score 83 runs.

Rizwan scored 45 runs with the help of five boundaries while Khushdil’s 56-run knock included five fours and three maximums.

Wahab Riaz took three wickets while conceding 28 runs in his four overs.

Southern Punjab chased the target with nine balls to spare. Saif and Wahab supported the batting line of their team as the top-order completely failed to get off the mark.

Mohammad Mohsin bagged three wickets for KP.

description: Saif Badar (49*) and Wahab Riaz (42*) partnered strongly to mark the first victory for Southern Punjab by four wickets against Khyber Pakhtunkhwa (KP) in National T20 Cup.
